title: Summary of Defeated Kings
summary: Joshua 12 provides a summary of all the kings defeated by Israelâ€”two east of the Jordan under Moses and thirty-one west of the Jordan under Joshua.

faq.question: How many kings were defeated west of the Jordan?
Who were the major kings defeated east of the Jordan?
faq.answer: Sihon, king of the Amorites, and Og, king of Bashan.
